original: @ga @#/_/khro bo chen po bdud rtshi 'khyil🔽pa'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: @ga @#/_/khro bo chen po bdud rtshi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs/
translated: Sādhana of the Great Wrathful One, Amṛtakuṇḍali

original: @gro   / @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a mr-i ta kro ta tshu la ma ha _sa d+ha na/_bod🔽skad du/_khro bo chen po bdud rtshi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje 'chang chen po
analyzed: @gro   / @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a mr-i ta kro ta tshu la ma ha _sa d+ha na/_bod skad du/_khro bo chen po bdud rtshi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs/_rdo rje 'chang chen po
translated: In Sanskrit: Amṛtakuṇḍalimahāsādhana🔽In Tibetan: The Sādhana of the Great Wrathful One, Amṛtakuṇḍali🔽Homage to Great Vajradhara!

original: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gdug pa dbang chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/nag po'i
analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gdug pa dbang chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/nag po'i
translated: Desiring to subdue the powerful and terrifying nāgas,🔽I will write the sādhana

original: klu rnams 'dul 'dod pas/_/gtum chen khro bo las kyi lha/_/de'i bsgrub
analyzed: klu rnams 'dul 'dod pas/_/gtum chen khro bo las kyi lha/_/de'i bsgrub
translated: of the wrathful deity of great violence.

original: thabs bri bar bya/_/byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/_/bla ma rdo rje can mchod la/_/
analyzed: thabs bri bar bya/_/byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/_/bla ma rdo rje can mchod la/_/
translated: With loving-kindness preceding, one should make offerings to the guru with the vajra,🔽and contemplate all phenomena as having the nature of emptiness.

original: chos rnams stong pa'i ngo bor bsam/_/de yi rang bzhin rnam dag las/_/pad+ma
analyzed: chos rnams stong pa'i ngo bor bsam/_/de yi rang bzhin rnam dag las/_/pad+ma
translated: From that pure nature, upon a lotus,

original: nyi ma klu brgyad steng /_/hum gi 'phro 'dus rdo rje 'bar/_/de las khro bo chen po
analyzed: nyi ma klu brgyad steng /_/hum gi 'phro 'dus rdo rje 'bar/_/de las khro bo chen po
translated: sun, and eight nāgas, the blazing vajra arises from the emanation and re-absorption of hūṃ.🔽From that, one should contemplate the Great Wrathful One,🔽the color of indranīla, with one face and four hands,

original: bsam/_/in tra ni la'i kha dog can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhis mdzes pa ni/_/
analyzed: bsam/_/in tra ni la'i kha dog can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhis mdzes pa ni/_/
translated: beautiful,

original: g.yas pa rdo rje las kyi khyung /_/rigs lnga rnam par dag par bsam/_/cig
analyzed: g.yas pa rdo rje las kyi khyung /_/rigs lnga rnam par dag par bsam/_/cig
translated: pure in the five families.🔽The other hand is a club, a kīla, and a thunderbolt,

original: shos dbyug tho phur bu 'bebs/_/brkyang bskum zhabs kyis gdug pa brdzis/_/
analyzed: shos dbyug tho phur bu 'bebs/_/brkyang bskum zhabs kyis gdug pa brdzis/_/
translated: with feet extended and contracted, trampling on the wicked.

original: rin chen klu yis sku la mdzes/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i go cha can/_/bskal pa'i
analyzed: rin chen klu yis sku la mdzes/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i go cha can/_/bskal pa'i
translated: Adorned with a precious nāga on the body, wearing a vajra-flaming armor,🔽residing in the midst of the fire of the eon,🔽the emanated garuḍa fills the sky.

original: me'i nang na bzhugs/_/sprul pa'i khyung gis nam mkha' gang /_/ye shes bcug
analyzed: me'i nang na bzhugs/_/sprul pa'i khyung gis nam mkha' gang /_/ye shes bcug
translated: Consecrate the wisdom being.🔽Having conferred empowerment, endowed with the armor of the garuḍa,

original: la byin gyis brlab/_/dbang bskur khyung gi go dang ldan/_/skad cig tsham gyis
analyzed: la byin gyis brlab/_/dbang bskur khyung gi go dang ldan/_/skad cig tsham gyis
translated: in an instant, clearly visualize🔽and accomplish the power of the mantra:

original: gsal ba las/_/sngags kyis rang gi nus pa bsgrub/_/om badzra kro ta a mr-i ta
analyzed: gsal ba las/_/sngags kyis rang gi nus pa bsgrub/_/om badzra kro ta a mr-i ta
translated: oṃ vajra-krodha amṛta🔽kuṇḍali nāga hana hana hūṃ phaṭ.

original: kun d+ha li na ga ha na ha na hum phat/_gal te las la sbyor ba ni/_/om badzra kro ta
analyzed: kun d+ha li na ga ha na ha na hum phat/_gal te las la sbyor ba ni/_/om badzra kro ta
translated: If you are applying it to activity,🔽oṃ vajra-krodha🔽amṛta so-and-so’s maraṇa soḍa soḍa

original: a mr-i ta che ge mo ra na sod sod/_ma ra na bying bying /_ma ra na mugs mugs/
analyzed: a mr-i ta che ge mo ra na sod sod/_ma ra na bying bying /_ma ra na mugs mugs/
translated: maraṇa bhyiṃ bhyiṃ🔽maraṇa muku muku🔽maraṇa halā halā🔽maraṇa myo myo

original: ma ra na ha la ha la/_ma ra na myos myos/_ma ra na myos bying /_thum ril ka
analyzed: ma ra na ha la ha la/_ma ra na myos myos/_ma ra na myos bying /_thum ril ka
translated: maraṇa myo bhyiṃ

original: ru na na ga ma ra ya dza dza/_rtags la phebs par gyur pa dang /_/gang yin
analyzed: ru na na ga ma ra ya dza dza/_rtags la phebs par gyur pa dang /_/gang yin
translated: If the signs are that it has arrived,🔽then kill it with the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: sbyin sreg las kyis bsad/_/yang na mi mthun rdzas kyis brab/_/nad pa'i lus
analyzed: sbyin sreg las kyis bsad/_/yang na mi mthun rdzas kyis brab/_/nad pa'i lus
translated: or strike it with the substance of the antidote.🔽Strike the body of the patient

original: la brab bya ste/_/gzugs la yang dang yang bstims te/_/nges par klu'i nad
analyzed: la brab bya ste/_/gzugs la yang dang yang bstims te/_/nges par klu'i nad
translated: and repeatedly absorb it into the effigy.🔽The nāga illness will definitely be pacified.🔽From time to time, please the deity with offerings.

original: rnams zhi/_/skabs su gtor mas lha mnyes bya/_/rin chen snod du klu sman
analyzed: rnams zhi/_/skabs su gtor mas lha mnyes bya/_/rin chen snod du klu sman
translated: Pour the nāga medicine into a precious vessel,🔽consecrate it with one’s mantra, and offer it.

original: blugs/_/rang sngags kyis ni byin brlabs dbul/_/zhi ba'i las de sngon
analyzed: blugs/_/rang sngags kyis ni byin brlabs dbul/_/zhi ba'i las de sngon
translated: This is the preliminary for the pacifying rite.

original: 'gro yin/_/bum pa gtshang ma chus bkang la/_/khro bo khyung dang bcas pa bsam//
analyzed: 'gro yin/_/bum pa gtshang ma chus bkang la/_/khro bo khyung dang bcas pa bsam//
translated: Fill the vase with water and visualize the wrathful one together with Garuḍa.

original: rig pa gong mas gtab pa la/_/chu ni khol ba'am rlangs byung nas/_/nges
analyzed: rig pa gong mas gtab pa la/_/chu ni khol ba'am rlangs byung nas/_/nges
translated: If the water boils or steams when the above mantra is recited,🔽then definitely perform the bathing rite.

original: par bkru ba byas gyur pas/_/'byung po ma lus nad zhi'o/_/gzhan yang gdon
analyzed: par bkru ba byas gyur pas/_/'byung po ma lus nad zhi'o/_/gzhan yang gdon
translated: All the bhūtas will be cured of their illnesses.🔽If one wishes to destroy the great grahas, insert one’s mantra.

original: chen po rnams/_gzhom par 'dod na rang sngags gzhug_/'di ni bsrung ba
analyzed: chen po rnams/_gzhom par 'dod na rang sngags gzhug_/'di ni bsrung ba
translated: This is the protection

original: dam pa yin/_/gro ga ras la bris pa yis/_/bsrung ba de'i mgul du gdags//
analyzed: dam pa yin/_/gro ga ras la bris pa yis/_/bsrung ba de'i mgul du gdags//
translated: should be tied around the neck.🔽Ghee, gugul, shudag,🔽urga, cuckoo, and ati

original: gla rtshi gu gul shu dag dang /_/ngur ba khu byug 'dza' ti dang /_/tshan dan a ka
analyzed: gla rtshi gu gul shu dag dang /_/ngur ba khu byug 'dza' ti dang /_/tshan dan a ka
translated: together with sandalwood and🔽akaru, mixed with the water of a child,

original: ru dang bcas/_/byis pa'i chu yis sbrus pa ni/_/ri lu sran tshhad gtor gtang
analyzed: ru dang bcas/_/byis pa'i chu yis sbrus pa ni/_/ri lu sran tshhad gtor gtang
translated: make a pill the size of a mustard seed.

original: bya/_/nang gi gdon rnams zhi bar byed/_/rgya tshhil phag pa sram gyi brun/_/
analyzed: bya/_/nang gi gdon rnams zhi bar byed/_/rgya tshhil phag pa sram gyi brun/_/
translated: This will pacify the inner demons.🔽Gutila, pig, otter, and🔽gugul, peacock meat,

original: gu gul rma bya'i sha dang ni/_/ra thug lug thug rmang kha dang /_/rta bon rwa'i
analyzed: gu gul rma bya'i sha dang ni/_/ra thug lug thug rmang kha dang /_/rta bon rwa'i
translated: goat, sheep, and the placenta,🔽horse penis,🔽and the ash of a burnt fish brain

original: gzhob dang ni/_/nya'i glad pa me la bsreg_/lus gos sna nas bdugs pa yis/_/
analyzed: gzhob dang ni/_/nya'i glad pa me la bsreg_/lus gos sna nas bdugs pa yis/_/
translated: should be fumigated from the nose while wearing the clothes.

original: khro bo chen po bdud rtshi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: khro bo chen po bdud rtshi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs
translated: The Sādhana of the Great Wrathful One, Amṛtakuṇḍali

original: bar gyi gdon las mchog tu shis/_/rtshan dug dri chen shing khun dang /_/ 'bras bu gsum dang tshha ba gsum/_/bya rgod spos dang mon spos dang /_/ gcan zan spu dang khrag rnams dang /_/thar nu thang phrom spru nag dang /_/dri
analyzed: bar gyi gdon las mchog tu shis/_/rtshan dug dri chen shing khun dang /_/ 'bras bu gsum dang tshha ba gsum/_/bya rgod spos dang mon spos dang /_/ gcan zan spu dang khrag rnams dang /_/thar nu thang phrom spru nag dang /_/dri
translated: Tar-nut, wild thyme, and black aconite🔽If you anoint your body with these

original: chus lus la byugs gyur na/_/nges par gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/_/
analyzed: chus lus la byugs gyur na/_/nges par gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/_/
translated: The demons will certainly flee.🔽Furthermore, with the bones, flesh,

original: gzhan yang bya khyung rus pa sha_/khrag dang lpags pa spu rnams kyis/_/phyi nang
analyzed: gzhan yang bya khyung rus pa sha_/khrag dang lpags pa spu rnams kyis/_/phyi nang
translated: Blood, skin, and fur of the garuḍa,🔽You will conquer the nāga illnesses of the outer, inner, and intermediate states.

original: bar gsum klu nad 'joms/_/de la drag po'i sngags med na/_/go cha med
analyzed: bar gsum klu nad 'joms/_/de la drag po'i sngags med na/_/go cha med
translated: If you do not have the wrathful mantras,🔽It is like taking up a weapon without armor.🔽This is the armor of the invincible supreme one.

original: pa'i mtshhon thogs 'dra/_/'di ni mi thub go cha mchog_/sngags kyi nus pa sngar
analyzed: pa'i mtshhon thogs 'dra/_/'di ni mi thub go cha mchog_/sngags kyi nus pa sngar
translated: The power of the mantras has already been explained.🔽Make a frog out of dough

original: song bya/_/bag zan las ni sbal pa'i gzugs/_/khro bo kham phor steng bzhag ste//
analyzed: song bya/_/bag zan las ni sbal pa'i gzugs/_/khro bo kham phor steng bzhag ste//
translated: And place it on top of a wrathful skull cup.🔽In the mantras of the great nāgas,🔽Add oṃ bhūmi pati sarva gṛha

original: klu chen rnams kyi sngags dag la/_/om bu mi pa ti sarba gdags/_/klu sman 'o
analyzed: klu chen rnams kyi sngags dag la/_/om bu mi pa ti sarba gdags/_/klu sman 'o
translated: And the nāga medicines.

original: mas lus la btig_/nyin re zhing yang zhag bdun bar/_/bsgrub pa byas te
analyzed: mas lus la btig_/nyin re zhing yang zhag bdun bar/_/bsgrub pa byas te
translated: The mother should be placed on the body, and the practice should be done for seven days.

original: sbal pa de/_/gnod pa'i phyogs su bzhugs nas kyang /_/steng du mthun pa'i
analyzed: sbal pa de/_/gnod pa'i phyogs su bzhugs nas kyang /_/steng du mthun pa'i
translated: The frog should be placed in the direction of the harm, and above it🔽the concordant substances should be offered.

original: rdzas rnams sbyin/_/nges par gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis bsgrub
analyzed: rdzas rnams sbyin/_/nges par gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/_/bdag gis bsgrub
translated: The harm will definitely be pacified.🔽By my having done this practice, may the good fortune of nāga illness be cleared away,

original: thabs 'di byas pas/_/skal ldan klu nad byang nas kyang /_/khro bo chen pos
analyzed: thabs 'di byas pas/_/skal ldan klu nad byang nas kyang /_/khro bo chen pos
translated: and may the great wrathful one🔽show his body and attain the stage of Vajradhara.

original: lus ston cing /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob shog_/khro bo bdud rtshi 'khyil pa
analyzed: lus ston cing /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob shog_/khro bo bdud rtshi 'khyil pa
translated: The practice of the great wrathful Amṛtakuṇḍali

original: chen po'i bsgrub thabs/_rje btshun thang lo pas bla ma'i gdams pa dang /_bya
analyzed: chen po'i bsgrub thabs/_rje btshun thang lo pas bla ma'i gdams pa dang /_bya
translated: was composed by the venerable Tsaṅtra Lotsāwa based on the instructions of his guru and

original: khyung las rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//🔽lo tshha ba slan chung dar ma tshhul khrims kyis/_rje btshun wa la tshan tra la gu
analyzed: khyung las rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_// lo tshha ba slan chung dar ma tshhul khrims kyis/_rje btshun wa la tshan tra la gu
translated: the Khyungma Tantra. It is complete.🔽The young Darmatshül of Lotshā🔽offered a golden mandala to the venerable Tsantri

original: lang gser gyi ma d+hal phul nas zhus pa'o//_//
analyzed: lang gser gyi ma d+hal phul nas zhus pa'o//_//
translated: and requested it.
